item.title: About
item.description: Current  Resume I’m based out of Orlando, Florida, USA, and am currently working as a freelance developer learning more web-focused technologies. My work history includes: Military Small-Arms Simulations with C, C++, and C# Experience with CryEngine and Unity Windows Desktop UI development LAN Networking with TCP/UDP and DDS Bio I’ve been exposed to computers since I was about 10, but primarily for video games, chat rooms, that sort of thing.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello! My name is Will and I’m interested in programming, wakeskating, and a handful of other things I’m progressively less good at. This is me wiring up a personal website, and this blog is starting primarily so I’ve got a little bit of content to fatten it up. At the same time it gives me a chance to improve both my technical and not-so-technical writing skills, something I haven’t truly done since leaving college.
